    • setId

      public Edge.EdgeBuilder setId(long id)
      Setter for edge ID. In general, don't need an ID to control the edges. Therefore, it is better not to set the ID.
      Parameters:
      id - edge ID
      Returns:
      EdgeBuilder instance
